subject: Talladega Superspeedway
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Denny Hamlin picked up his first career victory on a restrictor-plate track, grabbing the lead in the Aaron’s 499 from Kevin Harvick and holding on when a late caution ended the race at Talladega Superspeedway in Alabama.
snippet: Denny Hamlin picked up his first career victory on a restrictor-plate track, grabbing the lead in the Aaron’s 499 from Kevin Harvick and holding on when a late caution ended the race at Talladega Superspeedway in Alabama.
